Interface DistinctPublisher<TResult>

Type Parameters:
TResult - The type of the result.
All Superinterfaces:

public interface DistinctPublisher<TResult> extends Publisher<TResult>
Iterable for distinct.

1.0

    • batchSize

      DistinctPublisher<TResult> batchSize(int batchSize)
      Sets the number of documents to return per batch.

      Overrides the Subscription.request(long) value for setting the batch size, allowing for fine-grained control over the underlying cursor.

      Parameters:
      batchSize - the batch size
      Returns:
      this
      Since:
